verses.name: Matthew 8:21
verses.text: And another of his disciples said unto him, Lord, suffer me first to go and bury my father.

verses.name: Matthew 8:22
verses.text: But Jesus said unto him, Follow me; and let the dead bury their dead.

verses.name: Matthew 8:23
verses.text: And when he was entered into a ship, his disciples followed him.

verses.name: Matthew 8:24
verses.text: And, behold, there arose a great tempest in the sea, insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves: but he was asleep.

verses.name: Matthew 8:25
verses.text: And his disciples came to him, and awoke him, saying, Lord, save us: we perish.
